analysis.description:
OceanProtocol.startDate (/unique_chucks/33/0x7fc308494ebda65aefa2495dd0ef1f67084c817d.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x7fc308494ebda65aefa2495dd0ef1f67084c817d.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x7fc308494ebda65aefa2495dd0ef1f67084c817d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x7fc308494ebda65aefa2495dd0ef1f67084c817d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x7fc308494ebda65aefa2495dd0ef1f67084c817d.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
